metadata.title: CVE-2013-2080 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.description: The core_grade component in Moodle through 2.2.10, 2.3.x before 2.3.7, and2.4.x before 2.4.4 does not properly consider the existence of hiddengrades, which allows remote authenticated users to obtain sensitiveinformation by leveraging the student role and reading the GradebookOverview report.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
